objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Comedy lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about family and relationships using formal register
Students create original comedy themed content about family and relationships in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Comedy story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using formal register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in formal register within comedy theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
